author: mirichmo
body: We (maintainers) need to update [releasing.md](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/maintainers/releasing.md) to reflect the current state of the release process using our internal automation.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: I think it's been updated sufficiently since when this was opened.  There's still improvements we can make to how we release, but let's have those as separate specific issues.

title: Update releasing.md
